certification.title: Accelerating healing
certification.desc: With more that 10 years professional experience, I never stop improving my skills and try to find a specific approach to every, because my aim is to cure and restore every single one of my clients.

booking.reserve.title: Massage treatments
booking.reserve.subtitle: Select one that fits your needs the most
booking.reserve.massage.sport.title: Sport massage
booking.reserve.massage.sport.subtitle: Designed to prevent and treat injuries, improve flexibility, and enhance athletic performance.
booking.reserve.massage.shwedish.title: Shwedish massage
booking.reserve.massage.shwedish.subtitl: Using lotion or oil, massage therapists typically begin with broad general strokes and then transition to specific strokes to address problem areas.
booking.reserve.massage.limpha.title: Lymphatic drainage
booking.reserve.massage.limpha.subtitle: Removal of excess fluid and other metabolic products from the intercellular space to improve the transport function of the arterial and venous systems.
booking.reserve.massage.shiatsu.title: Shiatsu massage
booking.reserve.massage.shiatsu.subtitle: Apply pressure using only the fingers, palms and especially the thumbs on points that have been related to the central and autonomic nervous systems.
